synopsis.text: It was no ordinary life for Jiro, who was left as a baby in the care of foster parents by a colossal oni, with a promise to return after 15 years. As Jiro navigates through his teenage years, he begins to experience peculiar dreams and the sudden growth of horns on his head, hinting at his true identity. When his girlfriend becomes the target of sinister creatures, Jiro's hidden powers awaken, forcing him to confront his destiny as the reincarnation of Shuten Doji. To protect his loved ones and unravel the mystery behind his birth, Jiro embarks on a perilous journey across dimensions, battling dark cultists, oni, and their minions in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
